title: More amateurish than a student film by a 12 year old, no offense to the 12 year old.
review: I literally didn't think it was possible for a movie accepted and posted on Amazon prime video to be more amateurish than a student film by a 12 year old, (who would do better). You've gotta watch the first ten minutes. It's mind boggling. The most rote robotic readings by pre teens spouting R-rated dialogue, then cutting to John Waters'-like line readings in a bar. Whoah!

title: Fun movie
review: Watched this in the theater. Super fun. Tons of laughs. Great work.
